title: OnePlus U1S 164 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV  (65UC1A00)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N TELEVISION SET, 1N REMOTE CONTROLLER ,2N AAA BATTERY, 2N STAND BASE, 1N POWER CORD, 1N USER MANUAL, 1N WARRANTY CARD, 1N WALL-MOUNT BRACKET, 1N AV-IN ADAPTER, 4N SCREWS
product_specification.Content Providers: OxygenPlay, YouTube, Prime Video, Netflix, Spotify, Google Play Store, Bluetooth Stereo, File Browser, Weather, OnePlus Pictorial, Camera
product_specification.Digital Audio Output: Speaker (Channel 2.0), SPDIF, HDMI eARC (PCM, DD, DD+ (ATMOS), MAT (ATMOS))
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 year warranty on product and 1 year warranty on panel
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear and Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.4K UHD Display with a Billion Colours: The 4K UHD display features 8.3 million pixels resolution to deliver impressive and realistic visuals. With HDR10+ certification, HDR10, and HLG support, you’ll experience extraordinary details and dynamic contrast.
product_description.30 W speakers Co-tuned with Dynaudio: This U1 series TV features sound co-tuned with Dynaudio, a Danish loudspeaker maker. Thus, you can experience well-balanced, cinematic audio quality.

review: Such a good picture quality and gorgeous sound quality and the installation person is very humble gorgeous installation in next day of the delivery installation completed in 30-50 mins.but the cons is this OnePlus tv doesn't support Dolby vision

I purchased this OnePlus TV yesterday. The picture quality is immaculate as well as the sound quality. The brightness and color contrast of the TV is amazing. The installation for the stand setup can be done by yourself as it is pretty simple. Operating the TV is very user-friendly and connecting to wireless platforms like Wi-Fi and Bluetooth are simple. Overall performance is brilliant and the price tag is justified. Outstanding job by OnePlus.

On 17th June 2021 received the ONEPLUS U1S 55 inch smart TV. The delivery person delivered carefully and packaging is intact.
On next day (18-6-2021) installing done( by 11.30 am) and demo shown by service personal who is very well knowledgeable in fitting TV to wall mount and giving demo.
In this model both wall mount and stand was Included by ONEPLUS. I used wall mount.
Used TV all day and giving this review.
Used 4k setup box and jio net. Saw Avengers-end game.
I observed that if content is Dolby then we can have dolby sound just like in theatre.
Sound quality is superb. At low volume(30 in TV) and 2 in setup box I enjoyed Dolby effect while watching the Avenger movie. No need of external Dolby speakers, if want can use...result will enhanced Dolby effect.
I didnot change picture settings and used company settings, excellent picture quality.
HD content is superb and non-HD content is okay.
Sound and picture quality us excellent for live channels.
After 14 days of using the tv, one excellent feature Oneplus U1S tv has is, when turn off setup box after few minutes screen will turn displaying scenes(as in case oof samsung frame tv)

No second thoughts.. just go for it

In addition built in chromecast, android 10+, all entertainment apps accessible on 55 inch TV with dynamic sound , bazel free panel and including 1 yr warranty on TV & 2yr warranty on panel at only 44k 😄😄👍👍
As a consolation one+bud free of cost ☺️😍, what else you needed in this price... GO FOR IT🏃‍♂️🏃‍♂️

Awesome picture quality, great sound and truly a great experience of watching TV, only con is that there is lag sometimes which I believe can be fixed with updates , rest it is the best TV in this price range..

1. Software is very lagging, remote response is worst. Ratting : 1/5
2. View angle: OnePlus team have not given importance for the viewing angel. Ratting 1/5
3. Wifi connectivity: very worst even sometimes if you keep the near to the tv it shows moderate coverage. Ratting: 1/5
4. Sound quality: Dolby sound effects are good with in-built speakers, but for voice and dialogues worst to hear. Ratting 1/5.
5. Gama engine: when you watch 4k scenes with fast action or frames you couldn't experience the smooth frame. The ultra smooth algorithm just breaking the smooth frame experience. Ratting:3/5
6. Display brightness: little bit importance to brighter could have improved the picture quality > 350 nits Ratting : 3/5

Overall Ratting : 2/5.
Flipkart Ratting : 3/5.

My personal advice is go for samsung with little more money you get the awesome experience. And showroom buy always better for electronic products. You can experience and buy the product.

*Flipkart return policy ratting: 1/5*

I recently purchased this OnePlus Smart Android TV from flipkart, after a lot of research I finally decided to buy my first OnePlus TV. After using it for a week now I am very very happy with the product quality. The video quality is really very very good and even the sound output is impressive. The over all user experience is very good. Software is also smooth and responsive. Thanks to flipkart for super quick delivery and installation.

Once gain as a most preferred brand one plus doesn't disappoint, however few updates and improvements will make this tv a best choice.

1. SOUND - definitely a lot of improvement can be made as Audio 5.1 is not very clear in all the apps such as Netflix, hotstar, prime etc so manually have to change based on the output. In one app audio 5.1 is loud but in other it's not the same it varies. So hope this can be fixed from one plus side.

2. Software- sometimes I'm noticing a lag and even the screen gets struck when you press volume and then you try to pause the video or click on back button all in a very fast manner. Hope the response time and this glitch would be fixed in the next update.

3. Voice interface - this is not very effective, either in voice search as well as Google assistant.

4. The remote function - sometimes there is a lag and tv remote and functions doesn't work like volume and back button, prompt response is kind of missing sometimes. Hoping this could be fixed in the next uodate from oneplus.

Truly bezel-less, no border visible externally. Vibrant picture, yet multiple settings to configure to your best settings. Very soothing to eyes, even in high contrast pictures - thanks to auto-brightness control.
Very slim, comes with a good wall hanging set-up. Nice colours, nice sound too. For normal conditions do not have to increase more than 25, yet 100 does not disperse the sound. The surround sound is awesome.
The only drawback observed is, there is a lag in remote control operation and TV response, especially when watching Netflix. Otherwise works like a charm. The "OK Google" feature is awesome too.
But damn Flipkart, very bad customer service. There was a free gift of OnePlus Budz with this TV. I had to follow up more than a week to get it, after the return policy period. Calling customer care was not enough, had to complain on Twitter. I would recommend if you face any issues with Flipkart, complain in twitter, they work much faster there rather than calling customer care.

OnePlus U1S 50inch TV does perform well and has a few extra bells and whistles like far-field mics and good audio quality, but similar sized Dolby Vision-compliant TVs can be purchased for less.

Far-field mics for hands-free voice commands

Runs on Android TV 10

Bad Stuff:

No Dolby Vision support

No analog audio output

Ports are hard to reach

1. Tv remote can't be paired with set top box remote. Means you need 2 remotes always. Tv power control and volume control can be only through tv remote
Power button of the remote has 3 functions sleep, power off and o2 mode.
Other TVs we can download remote app on our smart phones. Here the app is not good
2. Normally tv ac operating voltage shall be rated for 230v and SMPS takes care of variation from 90 to 270 volts.
In this tv max voltage is 240 volts and the company advises customers to buy ac stabilizer at an extra cost.
So customers must buy ac stabilizer as voltage fluctuates sometimes above 250
this may cost about 3000 rs. additional cost
3..picture pre defined settings like vivid etc are not as effective as in Panasonic, sanyo or sony
4. Picture sharpness and clarity is not that good as in Panasonic. SD channels picture quality pretty bad.
5. Panasonic gives two remotes one for tv viewing other for internet viewing. Here only one small remote.
6. Sound is clear but not as good as panasonic
7. One plus store sells the same tv for 2000 rs less than flipkart. It's not fair.

The TV is okay but flipkart service was worst. Following reviews are based on my 3+ months of usage. It's an IPS panel with decent viewing angle and brightness. The software leaves a lot to be desired. It freezes occasionally when in regular use. Hopefully OnePlus will release a future OTA update. The Google assistant feature is as useless as it can be and you'll end up using it less. Tuned by Dynaudio i.e. the audio feature is gimmick at best. Sound quality is normal but loud. Connectivity is fine, sometimes struggles with casting but it's nothing serious. Finally, it took more than 25 days for flipkart to arrange for installation after delivery and it just ruined the overall experience. Overall it's a decent TV with latest functionality but what matters the most in a TV is the picture quality and that is just okay.

Been using for the past 15 days, I have encountered green lines flickering 4 times till now. Had gone through several searches regarding this issue and got to know that it is caused due to the nearby electric devices and lack of space for the airflow. But in our case there is more than enough place for the airflow, hence made sure that no electric devices are much near for the TV unit. After the adjustments, since 10 days I didn't notice any green lines flickering. Hope it will never occur again.
Other than that overall experience is Very Good.
Coming to the sound, do not worry about the sound and "take the question will it be sufficient?" out of your thought and after purchase you won't regret purchasing it. I too had same doubt at the time of purchase but everyone in the home were more than satisfied with this product. It's too good for the output they are providing. Dolby Atmos support works really fine and makes diffence while watching movies.
I would have given 4.5 accept for that flickering issue as it occurs with most products but there is no option for 4.5 and it deserves more than 4 hence 5 out of 5.
& Finally about shipping, Ekart had done very fine job with this & package was delivered As it should be.
Note:- OnePlus Connect app is a must use with many features it surely enhanced the user experience of Android TV and thanks for keeping aside the regular ir remote, the Bluetooth Remote is an added bonus. Great Job OnePlus!!
